items.sentence: Where do you plan to spend your summer vacation?
Why in the world would you want to go Australia?
Would you mind if I ask you a personal question?
It took me three months to read all those books.
It was Tom who taught me how to play the guitar.
It was difficult to tell if Tom was in his room.
It was still dark when Tom left home for school.
I wasn\'t surprised Tom didn\'t know what to do.
Tom didn\'t tell the stranger who he really was.
Tom didn\'t think Mary was the one who did that.
Tom didn\'t think anyone would enjoy doing that.
Tom didn\'t wake up until late in the afternoon.
I came here to warn you about what might happen.
I came to apologize for what happened yesterday.
It makes no difference whether you agree or not.
Tom had fifty dollars in his pocket at the time.
I wouldn\'t have been able to do it without you.
Tom wants Mary to learn how to play the trumpet.
Tom wants his children to have a good education.
I didn\'t recognize Tom the last time I saw him.
I didn\'t want Tom to overhear our conversation.
I didn\'t want his help, but I had to accept it.
I didn\'t want to do that any more than Tom did.
Would you please speak a little bit more slowly?
You need to have a heart-to-heart talk with Tom.
Let\'s meet halfway between your house and mine.

I hope that we don\'t have to wait for too long.
I can\'t keep up with Tom, but it\'s fun trying.
I can\'t leave until I\'ve found out how Tom is.
I could swim across the river when I was twelve.

It\'s convenient living so close to the station.
It\'s not only sports I like, I also like music.
It\'s not only sports I like, I like music, too.
What were you dreaming about when I woke you up?
When I was your age, things were very different.
When Tom broke up with Mary, she was devastated.
I have a lot of work to do before I can go home.
I have to write a ten-page paper by next Monday.

The car parked in front of your house is Tom\'s.

If Tom doesn\'t want to go, he doesn\'t have to.
We must finish everything before Monday morning.

Why don\'t you apply for the job of interpreter?

I\'ll see you bright and early tomorrow morning.

I remembered your birthday this year, didn\'t I?
Tom fell asleep and missed the end of the movie.
Tom finally agreed to let Mary in on the secret.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t know how to drive.
There was only one bottle of beer in the fridge.
This picture reminds me of when I was a student.
I want an hourly update about what\'s happening.
I can\'t think of anything I\'d rather be doing.

This spring, I plan to start taking Mondays off.
I can\'t believe Tom made such a stupid mistake.
I can\'t do anything until this project is done.
I\'ll regret doing that for the rest of my life.
I\'ll sweep the floor while you wash the dishes.
My name is Tom and I\'ll be your server tonight.

Everybody in my class prefers skiing to skating.
Everybody is planning to do something different.
We want to know why you weren\'t here yesterday.
We\'ll get them to talk no matter what it takes.
